archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0814
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want our customer databases to force the user to enter a note of explanation for access every time they exit a customer's account to ensure tight controls around customers' personal information

properties.value: The note of explanation should be entered after the interaction (when leaving the screen), unless it was previously entered for such interaction. It should be forced before a user is allowed to switch context to another customer. OOTB extension is needed to register Activiti everytime a user access customer data (enters 360 view of the customer)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
